casebody.data:
GRAPHIC ARTS MUTUAL INSURANCE COMPANY and David Elton Register, Plaintiffs,
v.
NORTH CAROLINA ASSOCIATION OF COUNTY COMMISSIONER'S LIABILITY AND PROPERTY POOL, Marilyn Singh, individually and Sabrina Marie Singh, a Minor, by and through her Gal Marilyn Singh, Sanders Garage of Jacksonville, Inc., and Onslow United Transit System, Inc., Defendants. No. COA15-377. Court of Appeals of North Carolina. April 5, 2016.

Case Reported Without Published Opinion

Affirmed.
